title: vEmpire.dDAO
author: vEmpire.dDAO
content: So not that ETH is on the final stage before it switches to PoS what will you guys do with your rigs?Do you have any recommendations to what one can switch?

comments.author: sxemini
comments.body: Quote from: vEmpire.dDAO on August 17, 2022, 08:36:56 AMSo not that ETH is on the final stage before it switches to PoS what will you guys do with your rigs?Do you have any recommendations to what one can switch?   Yes wait until it happen and than look at the profits for other coins. Never understand this questions, how the hell should someone know what happen?

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: vEmpire.dDAO on August 17, 2022, 08:36:56 AMSo not that ETH is on the final stage before it switches to PoS what will you guys do with your rigs?Do you have any recommendations to what one can switch?   The recommendations were current a few months ago. Now any actions will not be the most rational, because the prices for video cards have fallen and the profit will fall after the end of Ethereum mining. I do nothing but wait for better prices to replace my old graphics cards.
